overview.title: What the Programme Includes
overview.content: Expect a comprehensive intake with medical history, HbA1c, thyroid, cortisol and lipid checks. Medication (such as GLP-1 receptor agonists) is prescribed in precise micro-titrations to minimise side effects. You’ll receive a starter kit with pen needles, nutrition journal, grounding breath exercises, and WhatsApp access to our patient concierge.
highlights: Body composition scans at weeks 1, 6, and 12
Guided frameworks for mindful meals and protein pacing
Optional IV therapy add-ons to support digestion and hydration

faq.question: Which medications do you prescribe?
faq.answer: We prescribe licensed GLP-1 receptor agonists and related metabolic medications that best suit your medical history.
Our focus on nutrition therapy, gentle movement, and nervous system tools helps you maintain results even as doses are tapered.
faq.question: Will I regain weight afterwards?

faq.answer: Initial consultations can happen virtually and medication can be couriered, but we recommend periodic in-person visits for scans.

longDescription: Weight gain is rarely about willpower. It is about hormones, sleep debt, stress, and comfort eating patterns. Dr. Abbas combines blood chemistry, body composition scans, and weekly contact to prescribe medication safely while our nutritionist teaches eating rituals that feel grounding—never punishing. You receive written protocols, WhatsApp accountability, and a cheering section when milestones are reached.
